verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, keep not thou silence: hold not thy peace, and \w be|strong="H7892"\w* not still, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.
\w For|strong="H8252"\w*, lo, thine enemies \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tumult: \w and|strong="H8252"\w* they that hate thee have lifted up \w the|strong="H8252"\w* head.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* crafty counsel \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* people, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* consult together \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* hidden ones.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* said, \w Come|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* cut \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w being|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*; \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* no \w more|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* remembrance.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* consulted together \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* consent; \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w* do \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2142"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant:
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ishmaelites; Moab, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Hagarenes;
Gebal, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Ammon, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Amalek; Philistia with the inhabitants \w of|strong="H4124"\w* Tyre:

Assyria also \w is|strong="H3427"\w* joined \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*; \w they|strong="H5983"\w* \w have|strong="H5973"\w* holpen \w the|strong="H5973"\w* children \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Lot. \qs Selah\qs*

Do \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* Midian; \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Sisera, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Jabin, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* river Kishon:
\w Which|strong="H1992"\w* perished \w at|strong="H6213"\w* En-dor; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* became \w as|strong="H6213"\w* dung \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* earth.

Make \w their|strong="H1961"\w* nobles \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Oreb \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zeeb; yea, all \w their|strong="H1961"\w* princes \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Zebah \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zalmunna:
\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* said, Let us \w take|strong="H7896"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* ourselves \w in|strong="H3605"\w* possession \w the|strong="H3605"\w* habitations \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God.
\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3423"\w* God, make \w them|strong="H3423"\w* like \w the|strong="H3423"\w* whirling dust; as stubble before \w the|strong="H3423"\w* wind.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w that|strong="H7307"\w* burneth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* flame \w that|strong="H7307"\w* setteth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w on|strong="H6440"\w* fire;

So pursue \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* \w thy|strong="H1197"\w* tempest, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* terrify \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* \w thy|strong="H1197"\w* storm.
Fill \w their|strong="H3651"\w* faces \w with|strong="H3651"\w* confusion; \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* may seek thy name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dismayed \w for|strong="H6440"\w* ever; yea, let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* confounded \w and|strong="H3068"\w* perish:

\w That|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* may know \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* alone, whose name is \w JEHOVAH|strong="H3068"\w*, art \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Most High \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.
